tasks.title: Build Trading Dashboard v2
tasks.description: Redesign the trading dashboard with real-time charts, portfolio overview, and options chain viewer. Bobby needs live data feeds integrated with the new UI components.
tasks.agentNotes: Bobby handling data architecture, Anders building frontend. Charts library already picked — lightweight canvas-based.

tasks.title: Restaurant Menu Photo Shoot Planning
tasks.description: Coordinate the upcoming menu photo shoot for Tony's restaurant. Need to schedule photographer, prep dishes, and plan social media rollout.
tasks.agentNotes: Tony preps dishes, Paula handles visual direction, Remy plans the social campaign around the new photos.

tasks.title: Weekly Intelligence Brief
tasks.description: Compile weekly intelligence briefing covering market news, crypto movements, geopolitical events, and weather outlook for the week ahead.
tasks.agentNotes: Standard weekly brief format. Include BTC/ETH price action summary and any SEC news.

tasks.title: Social Media Analytics Report
tasks.description: Pull engagement metrics across all social platforms, analyze trends, and provide recommendations for content strategy adjustments.
tasks.agentNotes: Dax pulls the raw data and metrics. Remy interprets and writes the strategy recommendations.

tasks.title: OS Landing Page Redesign
tasks.description: Redesign the main dbtech45.com/os landing page with improved navigation, agent showcase section, and cleaner visual hierarchy.
tasks.agentNotes: Paula designs mockups first, then Anders implements. Need mobile-responsive approach.

tasks.title: Family Calendar Sync Setup
tasks.description: Set up automated calendar syncing for family events, reminders, and wellness check-ins. Include birthday reminders and appointment tracking.
tasks.agentNotes: Completed. Calendar integration is live and sending reminders via Telegram.

tasks.title: Sprint Planning & Agent Coordination
tasks.description: Organize the current sprint priorities, assign workloads across agents, and resolve any blocking dependencies between tasks.
tasks.agentNotes: Reviewing all agent workloads. Need to rebalance — Bobby and Anders are overloaded.

tasks.title: SEO Audit & Content Calendar
tasks.description: Run a full SEO audit on dbtech45.com, identify keyword opportunities, and build out a 30-day content calendar with topics and publishing schedule.
tasks.agentNotes: Audit complete. Content calendar drafted and shared. Key finding: need more long-tail keyword content.
